# VS Code Multi-Window Launcher

This project creates a macOS application that launches 6 VS Code windows simultaneously and automatically arranges them in a tiled layout on the screen.

## Project Overview
- **Platform**: macOS
- **Language**: Swift for native app, shell scripts for VS Code control
- **Purpose**: Launch and tile 6 VS Code windows with equal screen division
- **Features**: Automatic window positioning, screen division, terminal and chat panel focus

## Development Guidelines
- Use native macOS APIs for window management
- Implement AppleScript/shell scripts for VS Code control
- Focus on simplicity and reliability
- Ensure all VS Code instances have chat and terminal panels open
